Itemcount-15min-Athena-History-Test.ingredient_table_schema: ingredient_id, unit_of_measure, business_Date, timequarter, quarters, ingredient_quantity, location_num,generation_date

Initial_Dollar_QC.1: Initial dollars and transcount data matches the datalake data
Initial_Dollar_QC.0: Initial dollars and transcount data does not match the datalake data

Initial_Item_QC.1: Initial itemcount data matches the datalake data
Initial_Item_QC.0: Initial itemcount data does not match the datalake data

Initial_Dollar_QC.1: The final dollars and transcount data matches with initial data. Daily level data matches with 15 mins level data
Initial_Dollar_QC.0: The final dollars and transcount data does not match with the initial data or the daily level data does not match with the 15 mins level data

Initial_Item_QC.1: The final itemcount data matches with initial data. Daily level data matches with 15 mins level data
Initial_Item_QC.0: The itemcount data does not match with the initial data or the daily level data does not match with the 15 mins level data
